short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables Panaya ScriptBuilder to record your script

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Panaya Test Automation stands as a pivotal feature within the Panaya Test Dynamix platform, offering an advanced solution for capturing user activities across Chromium-based browsers.

This sophisticated tool is engineered to facilitate the swift creation of Automation scripts ensuring detailed and accurate recording of testing processes and highly changes tolerant approach to application changes.

Designed to support and enhance quality assurance workflows, Panaya Test Automation empowers teams to achieve higher efficiency and effectiveness in their testing and development cycles.
